summary: **Ted Lasso** is a funny and heartwarming TV show about an American football coach who takes over an English soccer team. Although the team's owner wants the coach to fail, his positive attitude helps the team succeed. The show stars Jason Sudeikis and has won many awards, including Emmys and Golden Globes. It's praised for its humor, great acting, and feel-good stories. New episodes air on Apple TV+.
title: Ted Lasso
